name: Nadia Heredia
body:
# Nadia Heredia

I am a Computer Science student, focusing on getting my degree, currently working on
my thesis project which involves Object Recognition in RGBD (RGB + Depth) Images


* [LinkedIn Profile](lnkdin.me/nadiaheredia)

### Education
* **June 2014–Present** Profesorado en Ciencias de la Computación (Computer Science Professorship)
    * University of Buenos Aires, Faculty of Natural and Exact Sciences (UBA - FCEyN)

* **July 2008–Present** Licenciatura en Ciencias de la Computación (equivalent to Computer Science Bachelor + Master)
    * University of Buenos Aires, Faculty of Natural and Exact Sciences (UBA - FCEyN)
    * Average: 8.76 (10.0 scale)
    * Expected graduation date: October 2014. ∼ 90% completed (17 of 17 finished
mandatory subject + 12 of 12 collected points of elective subjects)

### Courses
* **2012** Introduction to Mobile Robotics II - Escuela de Ciencias Informáticas (ECI) - FCEyN - UBA
* **2011** Introduction to Mobile Robotics I - Escuela de Ciencias Informáticas (ECI) - FCEyN - UBA
* **2011** Introduction to Artificial Intelligence - Udacity Online Course - Mark: 98.8%


### Work Experience
* **2012–Present**
Teaching Assistant Computer Science Department, FCEyN, UBA.
    Second and First Tier Teaching Assistant for the following courses
    * Programming Language Paradigms
    * Logic and Computability
    * Algorithms and Data Structures I
    * Computer Organization II

* **Dec. 2013–Feb. 2014** Engineering Intern Computer Science Academy, Google.
    * Learning experience for south-american women studying computer science.
    * Combination of classroom learning with training in computer science and software en-
gineering, with the objective of providing more experience and the skills needed for
successful carrers.
    * Technologies used: MapReduce, AppEngine, Python.
